name: 最后一锤
summary: The eagerly-awaited second film from writer/director Alix Delaporte (Angèle et Tony) is a profoundly affecting drama about a young boy determined to change the course of his future. Soccer mad 14-year-old Victor (extraordinary newcomer Romain Paul) lives in a community of trailers and huts on the seaside with his single mother Nadia (Clotilde Hesme). One day after practice Nadi...
